LanguageData.AchtungEnabledExplained: This mod can be turned on/off without restarting RimWorld
LanguageData.ForceDraftExplained: To draft an undrafted colonist while right-clicking, hold the selected key
LanguageData.IgnoreMenuExplained: To ignore the context menu while positioning colonists, hold the selected key key while right-clicking
LanguageData.RelativeMovementExplained: To move selected colonists relative to their current position, hold the selected key while right-click-dragging
LanguageData.CleanRoomDescription: Clean a room until it is completely clean
LanguageData.FireFightDescription: Fights a fire (even outside home zone)
LanguageData.SowZoneDescription: Sow a growing zone or room until it is completely sowed
LanguageData.AutoCombatDescription: Fight an enemy or target automatically
